title: Universal Tag Schema v1.1
description: Defines a universal structure for tagging requirements, decisions, risks, or other project artifacts.

tag_id.description: A unique identifier for the tag (e.g., REQ-001, RISK-002).

category.description: The classification of the tagged item.

description.description: A concise description of the item being tagged.

source.description: The document or meeting where this item originated.
